body_text:
This adds PreferenceExperiments.jsm to the add-on, which implements the API for starting and stopping preference experiments, persists experiment state to the profile, modifies preferences, and starts watchers to end the experiment if the user changes the preference. This also includes a new SandboxManager.wrapAsync method for wrapping privileged async methods for use in the sandbox.
It also updates the action code to use the API and to assign the user to a feature branch correctly according to the branch ratios.
This is (intentionally, for now) missing:

Checking for preference changes on a new session startup
Starting preference watchers on a new session startup
Removing expired preference experiments

(Including @chartjes on this for test coverage review of non-addon bits)

title: Preference experiment driver API
body:
This adds `PreferenceExperiments.jsm` to the add-on, which implements the API for starting and stopping preference experiments, persists experiment state to the profile, modifies preferences, and starts watchers to end the experiment if the user changes the preference. This also includes a new `SandboxManager.wrapAsync` method for wrapping privileged async methods for use in the sandbox.

It also updates the action code to use the API and to assign the user to a feature branch correctly according to the branch ratios.

This is (intentionally, for now) missing:
- Checking for preference changes on a new session startup
- Starting preference watchers on a new session startup
- Removing expired preference experiments

(Including @chartjes on this for test coverage review of non-addon bits)
